channel.title: See-through Chat box
channel.description:
Hi there,
I'm trying to make a clear chatbox, but just changing the area in the chat box to transparent doesn't work - I'm guessing this is because the game world area doesn't extend down to the chatbox, and so the chatbox just appears to have a white background.
Does anyone know where I can find and alter the size of the gamebox in the source code, so I can edit it to include the chatbox?
Thanks

item.title: See-through Chat box
item.dc:creator: @Baylo Baylo
item.description:
@Baylo wrote:

Hi there,

I’m trying to make a clear chatbox, but just changing the area in the chat box to transparent doesn’t work - I’m guessing this is because the game world area doesn’t extend down to the chatbox, and so the chatbox just appears to have a white background.

Does anyone know where I can find and alter the size of the gamebox in the source code, so I can edit it to include the chatbox?

Thanks
